argumentText:
ARGUMENT
g

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mplval.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | mplval.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 3 |  | mplval.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | mplval.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 5 |  | mplvalOLD.u | |- U = { f e. B | ( `' f " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin } |
| 6 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` R ) e. _V |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_eqeltri | |- .0. e. _V |
| 8 |  | #P_isfsupp | |- ( ( f e. B /\ .0. e. _V ) -> ( f finSupp .0. <-> ( Fun f /\ ( f supp .0. ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( f e. B -> ( f finSupp .0. <-> ( Fun f /\ ( f supp .0. ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- { g e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' g " NN ) e. Fin } = { g e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' g " NN ) e. Fin } |
| 12 |  | #P_id | |- ( f e. B -> f e. B ) |
| 13 | 2, 10, 11, 3, 12 | #P_psrelbas | |- ( f e. B -> f : { g e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' g " NN ) e. Fin } --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_ffun | |- ( f : { g e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' g " NN ) e. Fin } --> ( Base ` R ) -> Fun f ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( f e. B -> Fun f ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_biantrurd | |- ( f e. B -> ( ( f supp .0. ) e. Fin <-> ( Fun f /\ ( f supp .0. ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_suppimacnv | |- ( ( f e. B /\ .0. e. _V ) -> ( f supp .0. ) = ( `' f " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 18 | 7, 17 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( f e. B -> ( f supp .0. ) = ( `' f " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( f e. B -> ( ( f supp .0. ) e. Fin <-> ( `' f " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 20 | 9, 16, 19 | #P_3bitr2rd | |- ( f e. B -> ( ( `' f " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin <-> f finSupp .0. ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_rabbiia | |- { f e. B | ( `' f " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin } = { f e. B | f finSupp .0. } |
| 22 | 5, 21 | #P_eqtri | |- U = { f e. B | f finSupp .0. } |
| 23 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 22 | #P_mplval | |- P = ( S |`s U ) |
